!High Priest Sylvain: A change of profession occurs when someone with the required abilities and experience is promoted to a more advanced profession. A Human Mystic like yourself can change profession to become a *Human Wizard*, who practices elemental magic, or a *Cleric*, who seeks the will of the Gods. Which profession do you wish to know about? [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30070/09.htm|Human Wizard] [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30070/12.htm|Cleric]Â
